products.title: Sevilla Blackout Vivid Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: This sevilla vivid red roller blind really is a striking option to brighten up your dcor. Its got more than a little personality too!   Use it to keep your home funky and vibrant alongside darker tones or mix it in with bright oranges or yellows for a theme that screams warmth

products.title: Sevilla Vivid Red Vertical Blind
